level.text: On or before the 30th day of June of each calendar year, the Secretary shall compile and submit to the Council of the District of Columbia on behalf of the Mayor, a report covering the disclosure activities of each agency and of the Executive as a whole during the preceding year.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 46 D.C. Reg. 1191, 1198 (February 12, 1999).
